title: Entertainment round-up: 28 August 2015 - BBC News
summary: celebrity big brother line up revealed .
one named channel of the year .

documents.title: farewell for now
text: it 's the ( long ) weekend and the sun is shining ( for now ) , so get out there and enjoy it !
and do n't forget , fans of itv 's x factor can tune in to the 12th series at 20:00 bst tomorrow with new judges rita ora and nick grimshaw and , no doubt , some ear-splitting auditions .
author: Victoria Lindrea
Arts and entertainment reporter

documents.title: 'ultimate battle of airness '
text: the 20th air guitar world championships reach their conclusion on friday .
a record 30 `` dark horses '' took to the stage in oulu in northern finland on thursday - with eight contenders through to friday 's final .
they are joined by seven national champions who automatically qualify , including last year 's winner seven seas .
here he is in action
but only one can be the master of air .
the winner will be awarded with a unique flying finn guitar , handmade by matti nevalainen .
according to the ideology of the air guitar , wars would end , climate change stop and all bad things disappear , if all the world played the air guitar .
you know what to do

documents.title: pigs might fly again
text: pink floyd are to re-home a 12m ( 40ft ) inflatable pig which featured on the cover of their 1977 album animals .
the helium pig , known as algie , famously caused air traffic chaos after it floated free from battersea power station in 1976 , eventually coming to rest in a field in kent .
it had been listed for sale by durrants auctioneers next month , alongside a number of items of memorabilia from suffolk-based inflatable maker air artists .
but air artists ' owner robin harries , who was given the pig by pink floyd , said algie would now be returned to the band 's management and has withdrawn it from the sale .

the little man was born via a surrogate gestational carrier .
liu currently stars with jonny lee miller in the us tv series elementary as dr joan watson , opposite miller 's sherlock holmes .

the hot in cleveland star will play new 'squintern ' dr beth mayer who is called in to assist on a murder with ties to fantasy football , entertainment weekly reports .

documents.title: c4 drama 'ripped from headlines '
text: channel 4 has commissioned a four-part drama about a fictional public figure facing accusations of sexual misconduct .

created by this is england 's jack thorne , national treasure follows paul finchley , one half of a much loved comedy double act now in the twilight of his career , who is suddenly faced with an accusation of rape from the 1970s .
the series will trace the investigation and criminal trial , from the perspective of both the accuser and the accused .
thorne said : `` paul is a man who could be innocent or guilty .
we 're going to examine him from all sides and ask that big question
the series is due to air next year .
author: Deadline

documents.title: taiwan row over porn actress travelcards
text: there has been outcry in the taiwanese capital over the use of a japanese porn actress on its public transport travelcards .
the cards , which feature a ( no-pornographic ) image of yui hatano , are used to pay for journeys on taipei 's metro and bus network .
`` just because i am an adult video porn star does it mean that i can not pay a debt of gratitude to my beloved taiwan ? ''
she said .

documents.title: pubs granted listed status
text: in a 1946 essay , writer george orwell said his ideal pub would be `` uncompromisingly victorian '' .
he also insisted `` no glass-topped tables or other modern miseries no sham roof-beams , inglenooks or plastic panels masquerading as oak . ''
what would he have made of the 20 boozers across england , built between the world wars , which have been awarded listed status ?

documents.title: homeland trailer released
text: despite leaving the cia and taking up a post as head of security for a private individual in berlin , it appears carrie mathison ( claire danes ) is once again caught up in all manner of subterfuge as the fifth season of homeland returns to us tv this october .
as it says in the newly posted trailer : `` you can take the girl out of the cia , but ``

documents.title: boss 'terrified ' about top gear 's future
text: two controller kim shillinglaw has said she is `` really excited '' , but also `` terrified '' about top gear 's future with chris evans as presenter .
speaking at the edinburgh tv festival , she revealed the hit car show 's next series would be `` really different '' , following the departure of jeremy clarkson .
shillinglaw said she could not think of a better person than evans , with his passion for cars , to front the show .
`` there will be continuity but it will be really different , '' she said .
she also said clarkson 's controversial exit had been `` a very sad episode '' .
`` at the end of the day it 's about human beings , '' said shillinglaw , `` and i think it was just a very , very human situation .
i am , and always will be , fond of jeremy , james and richard . ''

documents.title: owen 'loves ' pinter role
text: clive owen has been talking about his forthcoming broadway debut in a new production of harold pinter 's play old times .
the play , which co-stars kelly reilly and eve best , sees a married couple 's relationship under strain when an old friend shows up and emotions run high .
the play will be directed by douglas hodge , recently seen on stage as willy wonka in charlie and the chocolate factory .
speaking at a photocall in new york , owen said : `` it 's a really stunning piece of writing and three great parts .
i love the part and i love the fact that doug , our director , has worked with pinter a lot . ''
the play opens at the american airlines theatre on 6 october .

documents.title: mcenroe covers nirvana
text: retired tennis champion and bbc pundit john mcenroe has been recorded playing a live nirvana cover .
he took to the stage to perform in new york last weekend in front of a crowd which included saturday night live producer lorne michaels and movie mogul harvey weinstein .

documents.title: the bridge returns to bbc four
text: for those pining for a spot of scandi-noir , crime series the bridge is set to return to bbc four this autumn .
swedish actress sofia helin returns as the dysfunctional detective saga noren , although her co-star kim bodnia ( martin ) will not appear in the third series .
the show follows the murder of a high-profile public speaker on gender issues .
earlier this summer , bodnia denied reports that he had departed the show following a row with producers ,
however , both hinted that bodnia might return for a fourth series - `` everything is possible , '' said the actor .

scandinavian stablemates arne dahl and new series beck - based on the fictional swedish detective martin beck and his partner , the impulsive gunvald larsson - are also scheduled for broadcast on bbc four later this year .

documents.title: sir terry 's tall tales
text: sir terry wogan is set to publish his debut collection of short stories .
those were the days is to be released on 8 october and marks sir terry 's first foray into fiction writing .
he will launch the book with a q & a session at the st james theatre in london .

documents.title: singer hits back at trolls
text: chvrches lead singer lauren mayberry has hit out at internet trolls who targeted her for wearing a short dress in the band 's recent video .
`` i am a 27-year-old woman wearing a minidress with wet-look hair .
if you do n't like it , that 's fine , but there is a difference between criticism and hatred , '' she told channel 4 news .
read more .

documents.title: mini band to open reading
text: it 's the reading and leeds festivals this weekend and bands like the libertines , mumford and sons , royal blood and the maccabees will all play the main stages .
but the honour of opening the reading event has gone to a band with members aged between 12 and 14 .
four years ago , a video of the mini band 's
the band will open the pit stage on saturday at 11:30 bst , the same day as metallica headline the festival .
can we smell a guest appearance in the air ?

documents.title: fassbender is an assassin
text: the first image has been released of michael fassbender in character , ahead of the film adaptation of the video game assassin 's creed .
fassbender plays callum lynch in the movie , which also stars his macbeth co-star marion cotillard .
lynch discovers he is a descendant of a secret assassins society and must do battle in the present day .
the film is set to be released in the autumn of 2016 .

documents.title: perkins ' culture secretary snog threat
text: comedian and great british bake off star sue perkins has told the guardian newspaper she went `` rogue '' and confronted culture secretary john whittingdale at the edinburgh tv festival .
she said the exchange , described by onlookers as `` full and frank '' took place `` albeit after one or two glasses of wine to engage with him about the government and the bbc '' .
making something of an unusual threat , she added : `` i said you will take my points on board otherwise i will kiss you into an horrific submission '' .
mr whittingdale later told the newspaper : `` she 's a feisty lady . ''
author: The Guardian

documents.title: princess bride live in toronto

reitman has previously recruited a-list friends , including bradley cooper and jack black , for live stage reads of the breakfast club , ghostbusters and shampoo .
this time he is scouting for stars to play fezzik and inigo montoya 's father

documents.title: bieber leaks early
text: the new justin bieber song has been leaked online , a few hours ahead of its official release .
the video for what do you mean has been posted on a number of sites , but has been repeatedly taken down .
over the course of the month , the canadian star has posted a 30-day countdown on instagram to the 28 august launch
it featured a huge range of celebrities , from mark wahlberg to britney spears , all promoting his new single .
the track , produced by skrillex , is being seen as a more grown-up style for the singer .
author: BBC Newsbeat
Radio 1 and 1Xtra

documents.title: new adele in november ?
text: adele 's follow-up to her huge 2011 hit album , 21 , will be released in november , according to billboard magazine .

it 's reported gnarls barkley producer danger mouse has been working on the album , with songwriting contributions from max martin , canadian singer-songwriter tobias jesso jr. and onerepublic 's ryan tedder .
adele 's 21 album topped the global sales chart for two years in a row .
author: Billboard

documents.title: celebrities enter bb house
text: last night saw the launch of channel 5 's ahem celebrity big brother , with tv presenter gail porter already emerging as the bookies ' favourite to win the reality show .
the show pits six us housemates against seven brits including former x factor contestants stevi ritchie and chloe jasmine whichello , who are engaged to be married .
uk contenders also include loose women panellist sherri hewson , former atomic kitten natasha hamilton , the bill 's chris ellison and 2014 apprentice contestant james hill .
best known among the us contenders is porn star jenna jameson .

she is joined by daniel baldwin ( the lesser known brother of alec , stephen and william baldwin ) , producer fatman scoop , us model austin armacost , teen mom farrah abraham and men 's mag favourite tila tequila .
favourite porter , 44 , is best known for having her naked projected onto the houses of parliament in 1999 .
she has publicly battled alopecia and depression .
`` gail porter is an obvious choice and we can not see any of the american contestants lasting very long , '' said a spokesman for bookmakers william hill .
comedian bobby davro and janice dickinson are due to join the show on friday night .
the pair will battle it out in a live showdown to be crowned president or prime minister of their nation and rule the entire house .

documents.title: and the honorary oscars go to
text: director spike lee and actresses gena rowlands and debbie reynolds will receive honorary oscars this year .
do the right thing director lee and a woman under the influence actress rowlands will receive awards recognising their contribution to film .
reynolds is to be presented with the jean hersholt humanitarian award .
the actress , who starred alongside gene kelly in singin ' in the rain , has been a long-time mental health campaigner .
the recipients will be celebrated at the academy 's annual governors awards on 14 november .
malcolm x filmmaker lee has earned two oscar nominations while rowlands , who was married to director john cassavetes , received two best actress nominations in 1975 and 1981 .
past recipients of the honorary awards include steve martin and lauren bacall while angelina jolie and elizabeth taylor have both received the jean hersholt award .

documents.title: one named channel of the year
text: one has been named channel of the year at the edinburgh tv awards .
sally wainwright 's drama , happy valley - starring sarah lancashire - was also named programme of the year on thursday night .
james nesbitt drama the missing , the great british bake off , strictly come dancing and coverage of the football world cup also won awards for the channel .
red production company - producers of hits include happy valley , last tango in halifax and c4 's cucumber - was named the production company of the year .
a second series of happy valley , which sees lancashire playing police sergeant catherine cawood in a small town in west yorkshire , was announced last week .

documents.title: get involved :
text: it 's friday and we would love to hear your thoughts on any of our stories today so , as ever , please get in touch by tweeting us us
author: Kev Geoghegan
Arts and entertainment reporter

documents.title: strictly line-up completed
text: first off , the final contestants in this year 's strictly come dancing line-up have been announced .

sky presenter kirsty gallacher and athlete iwan thomas will join fellow dance novices including singer peter andre , weather lady carol kirkwood and tv chef ainsley harriot in the 13th series of the bbc one show .
speaking on the one show , gallacher said : `` dancing is an entirely new challenge for me .
i ca n't wait . ''
olympian thomas - a regular presenter on the show - said he was `` hoping my dance partner does n't leave me behind '' .
professional dance partners for the 15 contestants will be announced during the launch show air on 5 september at 19:15 bst .

documents.title: good morning
text: it 's friday and the bank holiday weekend beckons , so stick with us and ease yourself into the long weekend as we bring you all the latest news from the world of arts and entertainment .
author: Victoria Lindrea
Arts and entertainment reporter
